attributes.action: Give the U.K people a referendum on leaving the european union
attributes.additional_details:
Do you think that europe controls to much of what happens in the U.K
Are you fed up with all the crazy laws that let murderes and rapists walk on are streets,free to murder and rape innocent people?
Are you fed up with all the crazy rules about every silly little thing like "straight bananas"?
Are you fed up with europe taking are money and giving nothing back in return?
Are you fed up with european politicians constantly criticizing and bad mouthing are country?
There is so much nonsense that comes out of brussles that i cannot possibly mention it all,so i ask you all to sign this e-petition and take control back from brussles and help make Britain great agian
YOUR COUNTR NEEDS YOU!!
